lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer won the Ginn Championship in Palm Coast, Fla., for his second Champions Tour victory in three starts, shooting a one-under 71 in windy conditions for an eight-stroke victory over Lonnie Nielsen and Tim Simpson. Langer finished at 12 under and earned $375,000 for his third victory in 11 career starts on the 50-and-over tour.
